p: We also investigated the effects of DCEO on the TBK1/IRF3 signaling pathway in RAW264.7 cells. As shown in Figures 4 and 5, the phosphorylation levels of TBK1 and IRF3 were obviously upregulated after LPS stimulation. DCEO treatment decreased the levels of phosphorylated TBK1 and IRF3 in a concentration-dependent manner, suggesting an inhibitory effect of DCEO on TBK1/IRF3 signaling.
